languages.text: "Ах {name}". {n}Кассия загадочно улыбается.{/n} "Будете слишком часто приглашать меня на "литературные" вечера, и слуги быстро поймут, что к чему".

traits.locale_text: "Ах {name}". {n}Кассия загадочно улыбается.{/n} "Будете слишком часто приглашать меня на "литературные" вечера, и слуги быстро поймут, что к чему".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ah, {name}." {n}Cassia smiles enigmatically.{/n} "If you continue inviting me to 'literary evenings' so often, the servants will realise what is going on."
languages.original_text: "Ах {name}". {n}Кассия загадочно улыбается.{/n} "Будете слишком часто приглашать меня на "литературные" вечера, и слуги быстро поймут, что к чему".

languages.text: «Ay, {name}». {n}Cassia esboza una enigmática sonrisa.{/n} «Si sigues invitándome a "veladas literarias" con tanta frecuencia, los sirvientes se darán cuenta de lo nuestro».
languages.original_text: "Ah, {name}." {n}Cassia smiles enigmatically.{/n} "If you continue inviting me to 'literary evenings' so often, the servants will realise what is going on."

traits.locale_text: «Ay, {name}». {n}Cassia esboza una enigmática sonrisa.{/n} «Si sigues invitándome a "veladas literarias" con tanta frecuencia, los sirvientes se darán cuenta de lo nuestro».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「ああ、{name}」{n}カシアは謎めいた笑みを見せた。{/n}「あまり頻繁に私を“夕べの読書”に誘うと、従者たちに勘づかれてしまいますよ」
languages.original_text: "Ah, {name}." {n}Cassia smiles enigmatically.{/n} "If you continue inviting me to 'literary evenings' so often, the servants will realise what is going on."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、{name}」{n}カシアは謎めいた笑みを見せた。{/n}「あまり頻繁に私を“夕べの読書”に誘うと、従者たちに勘づかれてしまいますよ」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “啊，{name}。”{n}卡西娅露出了神秘的微笑。{/n}“如果你继续这样邀请我参加‘文学夜谈’，那仆人们很快就会意识到发生了什么。”
languages.original_text: "Ah, {name}." {n}Cassia smiles enigmatically.{/n} "If you continue inviting me to 'literary evenings' so often, the servants will realise what is going on."

traits.locale_text: “啊，{name}。”{n}卡西娅露出了神秘的微笑。{/n}“如果你继续这样邀请我参加‘文学夜谈’，那仆人们很快就会意识到发生了什么。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia vous lance un sourire énigmatique.{/n}« Ah, {name}. Les serviteurs vont finir par se douter de quelque chose si vous continuez à m'inviter si souvent à vos "soirées littéraires". »
languages.original_text: "Ah, {name}." {n}Cassia smiles enigmatically.{/n} "If you continue inviting me to 'literary evenings' so often, the servants will realise what is going on."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia vous lance un sourire énigmatique.{/n}« Ah, {name}. Les serviteurs vont finir par se douter de quelque chose si vous continuez à m'inviter si souvent à vos "soirées littéraires". »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ah, {name}." {n}Cassia lächelt rätselhaft.{/n} "Wenn Ihr mich weiter so oft zu 'literarischen Abenden' einladet, werden die Diener noch begreifen, was vor sich geht."
languages.original_text: "Ah, {name}." {n}Cassia smiles enigmatically.{/n} "If you continue inviting me to 'literary evenings' so often, the servants will realise what is going on."

traits.locale_text: "Ah, {name}." {n}Cassia lächelt rätselhaft.{/n} "Wenn Ihr mich weiter so oft zu 'literarischen Abenden' einladet, werden die Diener noch begreifen, was vor sich geht."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Ah, ." {n}Cassia smiles enigmatically.{/n} "If you continue inviting me to 'literary evenings' so often, the servants will realise what is going on."

languages.text: "{name}." {n}Cassia esrarengiz biçimde gülümsüyor.{/n} "Beni 'edebiyat akşamlarına' bu kadar sık davet edersen hizmetkârlar olan biteni anlar."
languages.original_text: "Ah, {name}." {n}Cassia smiles enigmatically.{/n} "If you continue inviting me to 'literary evenings' so often, the servants will realise what is going on."

traits.locale_text: "Ah {name}." {n}Cassia esrarengiz bir biçimde gülümsüyor.{/n} "Beni akşam akşam 'kitap tartışmaya' davet edip durursan, hizmetkârlar ne olup bittiğini anlayacak."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
